short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze songs and generate set lists with Asaph, the only AI worship planning assistant for Planning Center Services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Asaph is an AI worship planning assistant that helps you analyze songs and generate set lists from Planning Center Services. 

SONG ANALYSIS
• Song 360: Analyse your entire repertoire, get deeper insights and receive recommendations for optimising your song list.

AI GENERATED SET LISTS
• Set List Generate: Enter a bible passage, keywords and themes to generate data-driven set lists in seconds.
